name: Rainy Pear
description:
My first ever game!

   This game allows you to get used to the role of a Pear that does not like to get wet.

Despite the Pear's dislike of water, it starts to rain, and you have to dodge the drops flying from the sky as quickly as possible.

The Pear has only three lives, which it must keep as long as possible.
Wait until the rain stops, if it ever does.

I will be glad if you will play it even once. In the future I will try my best make a better, cooler and more beautiful game.

If you want to help me  financially (to buy Unity Enterprise), just make a small donation. (1.50$) I will be as happy, as a poor game developer might be.
